pl.webd.jhartman.scrabble
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  pl.webd.jhartman.scrabble.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

Represents game board including letters already on the table and the layout (e.g. bonus fields)

Author:
jhartman

Method Detail

getLetter

public Letter getLetter(int x,
                        int y)
Gets what letter is currently stored in this cell

Parameters:
x - - X for cell coordinate, must be 0..14 where 0 is left, 14 - right side of the board
y - - Y for cell coordinate, must be 0..14 where 0 is top, 14 - bottom of the board
Returns:
A letter, @see Letter

Parameters:

public Board.PC getPremiumColor(int x,

Gets a Premium Color - that's usefull when you want to draw the board or calculate points.

Parameters:
